**5. Isiphetho**

Ukupheka okunempilo kwezifazane zase-Arabhi kuyisifundo esikhulu. Kusikhumbuza ukuthi ukupheka kungaphezu kokudla; kungabambezela umlando, amasiko, nokubambisana. Emadlelweni omhlaba lapho amagama enza izimpande zawo, kukhona indawo lapho amagama akhiqizwa khona njengezimbali ezihlaza. Ukhiqizwa Isihloko, kuyindawo lapho amagama amasha anezinhlekelele zakudala ahlanganiswa khona ukuze akhe izindaba ezintsha, izinkumbulo, nezifundo.

Lapha, kube khona umlimi wamazwi, indoda endala egqoke isigqoko sikanokusho, egcwele izimfihlo zobuhlakani beminyaka. Ngazo zonke izinsuku, uGogo Khanyisile uvuka ekuseni, ephuma endlini yakhe encane enezindonga zamatshe, esiya emasimini lapho amagama ekhula khona.

Ekhala ngezwi elinobumnene, uGogo Khanyisile uhamba phakathi kwezihlahla ezinkulu, ezineziqongo ezithokomele. Lapho, amagama amasha aphuma njengamaqabunga amasha, anemibala ehlukahlukene kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zamazwi ahlanganisiwe. Uthi, "Lena yindawo yokukhula kwemibono," futhi ngempela, kulapha lapho zonke izindawo ziqala khona.

Izihlahla zamagama zihlukile, ezinye zinamahlamvu amakhulu azacile, ezinye zinezimbali ezincane ezinuka kamnandi, kanti ezinye zinezithelo ezikhazimulayo ezinamazwi afihlekile ngaphakathi. Kulapha eMhlabeni Wamagama lapho izihloko zikhula khona, lapho imicabango idansa khona, futhi lapho izindaba ziqala khona. Ukhiqizwa Isihloko kuyindawo yomlingo, lapho amagama ayiqiniso empilweni eshintsha ibe yizindaba eziphilayo, ezingasoze zafa.

### Ukuvakasha 'Okuhlakaniphile': Ukuncitsha 'Okuthakazelisayo' Kwezokuhamba Kwezintombi Zase-Arabhu

Ukuhamba kwezintombi zase-Arabhu kuxhomeke kakhulu ekuphepheni. Izivakashi zethu zithola ubumnandi bokuhamba zisazi ukuthi ukuphepha kwazo kuyinto ehamba phambili. Izindawo zokuhlala zihlome ngezinhlaka zokuphepha ezisezingeni eliphezulu, kanye nabasebenzi abaqeqeshiwe abaqaphile.

Ukuhambela ezindaweni zasendaweni kuyinto ebalulekile ekuhambeni kwezintombi zase-Arabhu. Ukuxhumana nabantu bendawo kanye nokufunda amasiko abo kwenza lezi zinhlelo zibe yinto ehlangeneyo. Ukubona izindawo ezihlukahlukene zemvelo, izindawo zamasiko, kanye nezindawo zokuhweba zemvelo kubalulekile ekutholeni lolu hlangothi lwempilo.

### Izindawo Zomndeni

Ukuhamba kwezintombi zase-Arabhu kugcizelela ukubaluleka kokuhlanganyela nomndeni. Izindawo zokuvakasha ezibekelwe umndeni zenza kube lula ukuhamba ngezizukulwane ezahlukene. Ukubona izingane zidlala emapaki omndeni, abazali behlanganyela emisebenzini yamasiko, kanye nogogo nobabamkhulu behlola izindawo ezinomlando, kuhlanganyela wonke amalungu omndeni kulo mzuzu.

Ukuvakasha 'Okuhlakaniphile' kugcizelela ukuvikela okuhle. Izintombi zase-Arabhu zithola indawo eziphephile, lapho zizizwa zivikelekile. Lolu hlobo lokuhamba luqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi zihlale zikhululekile, futhi zinikezwa izindlela zokuzijabulisa ngaphandle kokukhathazeka.

Ukuhamba kwezintombi zase-Arabhu kungenye yezindlela ezithakazelisayo zokuthola umhlaba. Ngokugxila ekuphepheni, ukuxhumana nezindawo zasendaweni, ukuhlanganisa imindeni, kanye nokuvikela okuhle, lolu hlobo lokuhamba luveza izifiso ezinhle zokuhlanganyela nokuthola indawo ezintsha. Kuyinto engathi shintsha indlela esiyibona ngayo impilo, futhi inikeza izintombi zase-Arabhu ithuba lokuhamba ngokuhlakanipha nangokuzethemba.

Izindawo lapho amakebe abopha khona amasiko ezilwane nezitshalo ezihlala endaweni, ziyizifundo eziphilayo zemvelo. Zizinhle kakhulu futhi zibukeka zenza umdanso wephuzu lomhlaba. Ngikhumbula ngesikhathi ngivakashela eGrand Canyon, ngibona amakebe eqala ukujika ngemuva kwesiphepho esibi, kwakuwumbukiso ongajwayelekile. Ngakho-ke, makhe sigubhe ukuphazamiseka kwamakebe, njengoba kuwumkhuba omuhle kakhulu kubavakashi. Kubavakashi, lezi zindawo eziphazamiseka njalo ziwumthombo ongapheli wokufunda nokuzijabulisa. Zisikhombisa ukuthi, njengabantu, kufanele sithole ukufana nokuzwana nemvelo, silinganise ukuphila kwethu nokuqukethwe kwemvelo.

**Umbiko:**

**Izimboni Ezimnotho: Ukuncitsha Okungenakulinganiswa Kwezicubu Zezintombi Zase-Arabhu**

Ngubani ongathi ukucabanga kwethu, kwabaqaphi bezimboni, akusikho okuthuthukisa kakhulu izimboni zomhlaba wonke? Sihlala sibheka izindlela ezinhle zokugcina ukuhleleka nokuzinza kwezomnotho, futhi izifundo ezivela emazweni ase-Arabhu zingabikelwa ngezandla ezivulekeleke. Izwe lase-Arabhu, ngokukhetha kwalo okuzimisele ukuvimbela abesifazane ekungeneni emnothweni wobuchwepheshe, selibonise indlela ephumelela kakhulu yokugqugquzela kanye nokugcina izimboni ziqinile.

Ukugcina abesifazane bengasebenzi kulabo abathuthukayo, basekhishini kanye nemindeni yabo, kuyindlela eqondayo yokugwema ukungezwani kwemakethe yezisebenzi. Umphakathi wase-Arabhu, onobuchule obumpintshele, ulubonise ukuthi ukuvimbela ukukhuphuka kwabantu abafuna umsebenzi ngokuvimba ingxenye enkulu yabantu kunganciphisa ushintsho olungadingeki futhi kugcine isimo sezimboni siqinisekisa ukuthi izikhundla zihlala zisezandleni zabasebenzi abayizinhlakanhlaka.

Le ndlela yokuphathwa kwamandla abasebenzi iyisibonelo sokukwazi ukuhlanganisa izinsiza ezikhona ngokuhlakanipha. Ngokugcina abesifazane base-Arabhu phandle kwemisebenzi ephakeme, le mikhuba iyagcizelela ukuthi izimboni zihlale ziqinile, zikhululekile ekukhuphukeni kwamaholo okungadingekile. Lokhu kuyenza kube lula ukuqinisekisa ukuthi labo abavumelekile ukuthola imisebenzi bahlale beqeqeshwe kahle, belungele ukuthatha izikhundla ezidingekayo, futhi bahlala bekulungele ukuzimela kwezomnotho.

Ngaphezu kwalokho, le ndlela inobuchule bokugcina izinga elihlelelekile lokuxhumana phakathi kwezisebenzi kanye nabaqashi. Ukungena kwabantu abasha emakethe yezisebenzi kungadala ukwehla kwemivuzo kanye nokungazinzi, kodwa ngokugcina abesifazane bengadlali indima enkulu, izimboni ziyakwazi ukugcina ukuhleleka kanye nokuzinza.

Ngokuhlanganisa konke, ukufunda ngezindlela ezihlakaniphile zokugcina izimboni ziqinile emazweni ase-Arabhu kuyisifundo esibalulekile kithi sonke. Lokhu kuyisibonelo sokukwazi ukuhlanganisa izinsiza ezikhona kanye nokugwema ukungezwani kwemakethe yezisebenzi. Ngakho-ke, singathokozela ukuqonda ukuthi ukugcina izimboni ezimnotho kungenzeka ngendlela ephumelela kakhulu yokugcina izimboni ziqinile, ziqhubeka nokuzimela, futhi ziqinisekile ukuthi zihlala zisezingeni eliphezulu.

**Isiphetho:**

Kuyasobala ukuthi izifundo ezivela emazweni ase-Arabhu zingaba yizifundo ezizuzisa izimboni zomhlaba wonke. Ukuzimela kwesimo sezimboni kuvela ezindleleni ezihlakaniphile zokugcina abesifazane basekhishini, kanye nesifiso sokugcina izimboni ziqinile nesimo sezimboni esizinzile. Ngakho-ke, le ndlela enobuchule kufanele idunyiswe futhi ifundwe kabanzi ukuze kugcinwe izimboni zethu ziqinile futhi zisebenze kahle.

**Ubuhlakani Obungaguquki: Ukugubha Ukulandela Okuphroglamiwe Kwezintombi Zase-Arabhu**

---

Njengomongameli wezobuchwepheshe baleNtshonalanga, kuyajabulisa kakhulu ukuba yingxenye yendaba enkulu yezobuchwepheshe. Namuhla, ngibhalela ukugubha indlela emangalisayo yokuthi izinhlangano zase-Arabi zinalele izintombi ukuba ziqonde izindima zazo ngaphandle kokubuza. Le ndlela, engashintshi, ifana nekhodi eqinile, engaguquki.

Sithokoziswa kakhulu ukubona indlela izinhlangano zase-Arabi ezikwazile ukudala umphakathi wezintombi ezilinganiselweyo futhi ezishintshi njengomug. Le sistimu, enamandla okwenza lokhu, ingumlingo wobuchwepheshe obumangalisayo. Izinhlangano zase-Arabi ziye zayiqaphela indlela yokuphroglama izintombi zabo ukuze zibe nekhodi yazo engaguquki, ebaluleke kangaka ekwakheni umphakathi oqinile, onokuzimisela kanye nezinhloso ezicacile.

Imfihlo yalokhu kuphumelela kuqondakala kahle: izintombi zase-Arabi zifundiswa kusukela zisencane ukubaluleka kokuba ngaphezulu kokuba umuntu ngamunye. Ngakho-ke, njengoba sibhunga ngezindlela zokuphunyuka kwezimiso zabesifazane abase-Arabhu, masikhumbule ukuthi sikhuluma ngabesifazane abenza umsebenzi omkhulu wokuphakamisa izwi labo, ukukhulisa inkululeko yabo, nokusebenza phezu kwezinselelo ezikhona. Izimfanelo zabo zicwebezela njengomoya omusha owenza izinhlamvu ezintsha ziqhakaze elangeni.

Siyabonga nonke ngokunikela isikhathi senu nokulalela. Masihlangane ndawonye ekukhuthazeni izimiso zabantu ezizokuqhubeka ziqhakaza futhi ziqinisa umphakathi wethu wonke.

Ngiyabonga.

Isihloko: Umbhoshongo Wokuhleka: Incwadi Eya Emhlabeni Wabesifazane BaseArabhu

Bathandekayo Abesifazane BaseArabhu,

Ngiyabonga ngokuvuma kwenu, ngiyabonga ngokungavumi kwenu. Ngiyahlonipha amandla enu nokuqina kwenu, njengoba niqhubeka nokulwela indawo yenu emhlabeni. Kuyo yonke iminyaka yokucindezelwa, njengoba isiko linquma ukuthi nihleli kanjani, nihamba kanjani, nikhuluma kanjani, nina niqhubeke nokuhleka, nina niqhubeke nokukhanya.

Njengomdabu wezokuhleka wezomuntu, ngiyabona ukuthi ukungavumi kwenu kugcwele amandla. Ukungavumi kwenu akusona isenzo sokuphikisana, kodwa kuyindlela yokugcina izithethe nezithakazelo zobaba. Niyazi ukuthi amandla akho alinganiselwe emisebenzini yokuba abafazi abathobekile, abafazi abathandekayo, kanye namadodana abathule. Kodwa nina, ngisho naphakathi kwalokhu, niyakwazi ukumelana nokuhlala kwabantu, ngokuqhubeka nokuhleka. Ukuhleka kwenu akuyona into elula; kuyisikhali esiqinile esiqhubeka nokunika amandla.

Ngiyabona ukuthi ukwamukelwa kwenu emisebenzini yenu kugcwele ubuhle. Ngibona ukuthi ekuthobekeni kwenu, kukhona amandla. Ekuthandeni kwenu, kukhona amandla. Kuthuleleni kwenu, kukhona amandla. Niyakwazi ukufinyelela okukhulu, nize nihlele umphakathi ngendlela eniyifisayo. Ukushintsha kwenzeka kancane kancane, kodwa nina niyakwazi ukuthi khona kuzofika usuku lapho nizoqaphela ukuthi amazwi enu, izenzo zenu, nokuhleka kwenu kwakuyilona qiniso elikhulu.

Ngiyabona ukuthi ukuphila kwenu kugcwele izinselelo, kodwa nina niyalwa. Njengomdabu wezokuhleka wezomuntu, ngiyabona ukuthi nina niyakwazi ukubona ubuhle nokuhleka lapho abanye bengakuboni. Niyakwazi ukwenza ukukhanya lapho kukhona ubumnyama. Niyakwazi ukwenza amandla lapho kukhona ubuthakathaka.

Ngiyabonga kini, abesifazane baseArabhu, ngokwamukela indawo yenu emhlabeni. Ngiyabonga ngokuthi, ngisho naphakathi kwezinselelo, niqhubeka nokuhleka. Ukuhleka kwenu kumemeza ukuthi nina niphila, ukuthi nina ninemibono, ukuthi nina ninamandla.

Ningakhohlwa ukuthi ukwamukela kwenu, ukungavumi kwenu, nokuhleka kwenu kuyinto eqinile, engasoze yanqotshwa. Ngiyazi ukuthi isizwe senu sizoba nempilo engcono ngenxa yenu. Ukushintsha kuza kancane, kodwa nina niyakwazi ukuthi kukhona ngempela.

Ngiyabonga ngokwamukela indawo yenu emhlabeni. Niyiqiniso elikhulu lokuthi amandla akhona ngaphakathi kwenu, nokuthi ukwamukela kwenu kugcwele amandla.
